10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Mas'ud narrated that:The Messenger of Allah said: "Whoever has three that precede him (in death) while they did not reach the age of puberty, then they will be a well-fortified fortress for him against the Fire

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي ثَوَابِ مَنْ قَدَّمَ وَلَدًا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Rewards For One Whose Child Died Before Him
